subject: Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Even if the Slipstream-Chipotle riders cannot overcome the 49-second lead held by Levi Leipheimer of the Astana team in the final two stages of the race, they have made a strong impression.
snippet: Even if the Slipstream-Chipotle riders cannot overcome the 49-second lead held by Levi Leipheimer of the Astana team in the final two stages of the race, they have made a strong impression.
